effect.sun_moon: Changes the target to pure water-type until it leaves the field. If the target has multitype, this move will fail.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Changes the target to pure water-type until it leaves the field. If the target has multitype, this move will fail.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Changes the target to pure water-type until it leaves the field. If the target has multitype, this move will fail.

short_effect.sun_moon: Changes the target’s type to Water.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Changes the target’s type to Water.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Changes the target’s type to Water.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user shoots a torrent of water at the target and changes the target’s type to Water.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user shoots a torrent of water at the target and changes the target’s type to Water.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user shoots a torrent of water at the target and changes the target’s type to Water.
